string-array.name: note_details
string-array.item: Did you hear about the mathematician who is afraid of negative numbers?\n\nHe will stop at nothing to avoid them.
Why did zero and two break up? \n\nBecause some one got in between them.
Two is the only prime number that is even. That makes two really odd.
I got a three foot long ruler at a yard sale.
Why did the two fours skip a meal? \n\nBecause they already eight!
A roman officer walks into a bar, holds up two fingers, and says, "five beers please."
I went to buy six cans of Sprite the other day and realised I had picked 7-Up.
Warning: Never push the number 8 over. The ramifications can go on forever.
Why is the number nine so sassy?\n\nBecause she can\'t even!

Man at the theatre asks the usher: What's my seat number?

Usher responds: 10-Q.

Man responds: You're welcome. Now what's my seat number?

resources.string: Are you sure you want to clear the list?
